content:
Dear learner,

We understand that parts of the Aggregate Data Capture and Validation and Data Analysis courses have been challenging with little chance for retry. After discussing it with the course team we have decided to add a second attempt for each question with 3 or more options.

Additionally, we allow partial credit for questions with checkboxes rather than pass/fail. We hope that this will allow you to improve your grade for the course to a passing one. Best of luck!

The DHIS2 Online Academy course Team
